mapper.select: SELECT a.*, r.*, ri.*, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM reservation resv JOIN soldout s ON resv.biz_id = s.biz_id AND resv.r_id = s.r_id WHERE resv.biz_id = r.biz_id AND resv.r_id = r.r_id AND TO_DATE(#{checkIn}, 'YY/MM/DD') <= TO_DATE(s.resv_date, 'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_DATE(s.resv_date, 'YY/MM/DD') < TO_DATE(#{checkOut}, 'YY/MM/DD') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_reserved FROM accom a JOIN room r ON a.biz_id = r.biz_id LEFT JOIN room_img ri ON r.biz_id = ri.biz_id AND r.r_id = ri.r_id WHERE r.biz_id = #{biz_id} AND ri.r_img_id = 1

SELECT r.r_name, u.nickname, p.pay_id, re.rating, re.review_date, re.review_content FROM room r, reservation resv, users u, payment p, review re WHERE r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND p.user_id = u.user_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND resv.user_id = p.user_id AND resv.user_id = p.user_id AND p.pay_id = re.pay_id AND r.biz_id = #{biz_id} ORDER BY re.review_date desc

SELECT re.pay_id, ri.review_img FROM review re, review_img ri WHERE re.pay_id = ri.pay_id AND ri.pay_id IN
#{payId}
SELECT count(*) totalReview, AVG(rating) avgReview FROM payment p, review re WHERE p.pay_id = re.pay_id AND p.biz_id = #{biz_id}
